title: Meditation.live Wellness Coach Download
text: *** No.1 App in India, Singapore, Israel, Ireland ***Meditation.live is quickly becoming the no.1 app around the world. Our mission is to inspire 5 billion people to find their true purpose. Become part of a global community of meditators meditating together live.Why Meditation.live? We created meditation.live to help you LEARN. Perfect for beginners.Every day there are several free live classes that you can join and interact with one of many amazing meditation coaches, neuroscientists, doctors, famous authors and monks.We also added several sleep stories guaranteed to put you to sleep. We add new sleep stories every week, along with several guided sleep meditations and sleep music.Meditations: Variety of on-demand meditations focused on- Sleep: Sleep Meditation, Bedtime/Sleep Stories, Naps & Yogic Sleep- Relaxation- Anxiety- Stress- Focus- EmotionsMovement:- Yoga (including Accessible Yoga)- Stretching- Walking- RunningAnd Self Practice Timer (Insight Timer)We also Support Apple Health and Siri.WHAT YOULL GET (with Premium membership)* Daily interactive live meditation classes with skilled teachers from all over the world, sharing different styles and techniques. (no restriction on how many classes you can join)* Access to on demand yoga/movement and meditation classes* Workshops and private courses* Sleep meditations, Yogic Sleep and Sleep Stories* Insight Timer (Self Timer) with various sound options (upgraded for 4.0)* Company-wide leaderboard and support (for enterprise clients)* Youtube and Facebook live SupportTestimonials"The teachers have lovely voices and authentic teachings of movement, yoga, meditation and mindfulness practices. a very clear and attractive presentation of all the offerings are well displayed." - Jason Olson"life changing app" - Lisa"meditation elevated" - LgantzJoin a variety of live and on demand guided meditation classes that help you:* Improve sleep : Guided, Yogic Sleep (yoga), Deep Relaxation or Sleep Stories* Reduce Stress: classes and courses* Be part of a community* Manage anxiety* Improve focus and productivity* Foster self-esteem* Improve your emotional well being with Gratitude and Loving Kindness meditation* Experience our on demand meditation and yoga/movement classes anytime, anywhere* Attend a variety of live meditation classes every day* Make meditation part of your daily practice with our user-friendly app.* Become part of our community and engage in interactive conversations with our qualified teachers and students* Meditation classes specifically designed to help you thrive in the workplace* Experience the benefits of breath meditation, guided meditation, mindfulness meditation, zen meditation, visualization, sound meditation, stress relief, body scan meditation and much more through our live studio classes and on demand classes.* Track your progress with key stats and a leaderboard* Participate in workshops and private courses to improve your practice and overall health****Subscription pricing and terms****We offer auto-renewing monthly and yearly subscription at 7.99/month and $28.99/year to provide you with premium features of the app that you can use as long as your subscription is active. We also added a Lifetime option that is offered at $149.99 with unlimited upgrades and a lifelong of mindfulness, movement and happiness.Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to account settings after the purchase.Read more about our terms and conditions here:Terms of service: https://www.meditation.live/terms-and-conditionsPrivacy Policy: https://www.meditation.live/privacy-policy
